text: [MUSIC PLAYING]

Before we begin, there's one
thing we need you to know.
We are not saving lives.
We're not curing cancer.

We're not shooting a
satellite into the sky.
What do we do?
We deliver packages.

Over the past year we have
been waking up at 5:00

AM, drive to a big warehouse,
load packages in our car,

go back school, run
to class, finding time

to make some brilliant
comment, and then go out again,

deliver more packages
through the afternoon.
And you know what?

We strongly believe
that you don't

need a truck and a professional
driver r to deliver packages.

We believe anybody
with a car and our app

can deliver packages,
even my grandmother.

So this is more
than just an idea.

The drivers on our platform
have delivered over

3,500 packages all over
eastern Massachusetts.
And the best part--
our customer loves it.

They want to give
us more packages

and have us expand
to more locations.

We aren't the only ones
that believe in this.

All the money we have raised
has been from senior executives
in the industry.

Even the former CEO of FedEx
supply chain has invested.

Look, this is a huge
market, $45 billion,
and it's ripe for disruption.

So vote for us and together we
can make package delivery great
again.
[APPLAUSE]
